Time for a New Heating System?

Modern heating systems are more efficient, reliable, and safer than older units. Upgrade for better comfort and lower energy bills.

15+

System Age

Heating systems over 15 years old should be replaced

$$$

High Bills

Rising energy costs from inefficient equipment

Frequent Repairs

Multiple service calls indicate system failure

Poor Comfort

Uneven heating and temperature swings

Heating System Options

Choose the right heating solution for your home

Gas Furnaces

Most popular choice for reliable, cost-effective heating

  • • Lower operating costs
  • • Fast, powerful heating
  • • Works in any weather
  • • Long lifespan (15-20 years)

Electric Heat Pumps

Energy-efficient heating and cooling in one system

  • • Dual heating/cooling
  • • High efficiency ratings
  • • Environmentally friendly
  • • Perfect for Texas climate

Dual Fuel Systems

Heat pump with gas backup for optimal efficiency

  • • Best of both systems
  • • Automatic switching
  • • Maximum efficiency
  • • Reliable backup heating

Professional Installation Process

Expert installation for optimal performance and safety

1

In-Home Assessment

Comprehensive evaluation of your home's heating needs, including Manual J load calculations and existing infrastructure assessment.

2

System Design & Permits

Custom system design with proper sizing, equipment selection, and permit acquisition for code-compliant installation.

3

Safe Equipment Removal

Careful removal of old equipment with proper disposal and recovery of refrigerants according to EPA regulations.

4

Professional Installation

Expert installation following manufacturer specifications, local codes, and safety standards with quality materials and craftsmanship.

5

Testing & Commissioning

Thorough testing of all components, safety checks, performance verification, and system commissioning to ensure optimal operation.

6

Final Inspection & Training

Municipal inspection coordination, customer training on operation and maintenance, warranty registration, and ongoing support setup.

Benefits of New Heating Installation

Upgrade your comfort, efficiency, and safety

Lower Energy Bills

Modern heating systems are 20-40% more efficient than older units, significantly reducing monthly costs.

Improved Comfort

Even temperatures throughout your home with precise control and consistent operation.

Enhanced Safety

Modern safety features and proper installation eliminate risks from older equipment.

Quiet Operation

Advanced technology provides powerful heating with minimal noise levels.

Better Air Quality

Advanced filtration and proper ventilation improve indoor air quality for your family.

Increased Home Value

New heating systems add value to your home and appeal to potential buyers.
